job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain application systems utilizing AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the traditional software engineering task of building and maintaining systems, with the added context of utilizing AI, fitting the definition of integrating AI into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documenting designs and implementations is a core software engineering practice for maintaining code quality and consistency.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system, APIs, data structures, and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating technical documentation for system components, which is a standard software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines for AI/ML is a key aspect of MLOps, ensuring data is ready for model consumption and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to improving operational processes, a core component of DevOps and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and creating proof-of-concepts aligns with the research and experimentation aspect of model development.
This phrase explicitly mentions 'Prompt engineering' and its associated reliability, directly mapping to the category.
This mentions 'RAG' (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and vector indexing, which are core components of RAG systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI within new products / features and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the practical application of generative AI, which often includes prompt engineering and leveraging LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental data engineering tasks required for preparing data for AI/ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business requirements and guiding product features, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
job_tasks.justification: Presenting research and sharing knowledge across the organization requires understanding the business context and aligning technical work with organizational goals.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly indicates a blend of core software engineering tasks (design, develop, maintain applications, documentation, data pipelines, operational processes) and specific GenAI specialization tasks (prompt engineering, RAG, utilizing generative AI, exploring new technologies). The technologies listed (LLMs, RAG, Agentic Frameworks like LangChain) are all specific to Generative AI. The role requires working with AI engineers and product owners, suggesting a balanced approach between building software and applying AI, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning both core software engineering responsibilities and specific Generative AI tasks and technologies. The alignment with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile is strong and unambiguous.
